commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Great job, everyone.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: As usual, practice was like pushing a car uphill today. You could say I'm exhausted!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Sounds like you've still got some gas left in the tank.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: No way, I'm running on fumes right now. I gave it everything I got.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I can't wait to get back to the dorm and wash off the sweat.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I can't wait to... *Snore*

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: K-Kanata! You will not get any proper rest if you fall asleep here!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: She's right. You gotta have a proper meal before that. Food tastes so good after practice.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Looking after your health is also a part of practice. We must eat well, sleep well, and prepare for tomorrow!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: And with that, let's all call it a day.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh, I'm gonna stay behind for a bit!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Are you replying to your fan letters today as well, Kasumi?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Of course. It's one of my daily tasks!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I'm really amazed at how dedicated you are. I mean, you must be completely worn out from practice.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hey, look! Each and every one of Kasukasu's letters is so cute and customized!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yeah, they're all adorable. I'd be really happy if I received a reply like that.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Isn't it tough to stay behind every day? Rina-chan Board says, "Thumpity-thump."

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: First and foremost, Ai! I'm not Kasukasu, I'm Kasumin!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: *Sigh* Now then, let me answer all of your questions. I think you should be able to really feel my cuteness come through in each and every one of my responses!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: This is because all of my fans have had their hearts captivated by my super cuteness!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: So I need to be cute in everything I do!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: There is no room for compromise when it comes to cuteness! Cuteness is almighty!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: It's amazing how committed she is to her cause.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Yes, I genuinely admire that about Kasumi.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: She's the perfect model of a school idol.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I wanna write some replies as well, but I gotta get home and cook for Haruka.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I would also like to, however, my parents would be concerned if I came home late.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Don't worry about me. You guys can all hurry on home.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: If you insist! I've been fighting it off this whole time, but I'm so sleepy I could probably give Kana a run for her money.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Don't push yourself too hard, okay? Make sure you go home before it gets too late, Kasumi.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Yeah, yeah, I know.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: All right, then. See ya tomorrow, Kasumi.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Yup! Bye!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Um. Why aren't you going home with everyone else?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Wellll, I was just thinking of updating the website. I was actually planning on doing it tomorrow, but I changed my mind.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh yeah? I didn't happen to influence that decision, did I?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You sure did, after I saw how hard you're working.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Eep. R-Really? If you think this is working hard, then you're in for a surprise.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Who knows?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh, come on! You don't have to hide it! It's okay to be honest and say that I influenced you!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Hang on. What am I doing?! I don't have time for this. I need to write back to my fans!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'll roll my sleeves up and get to work, too!
